item.title: 算法竞赛常用模板整理
item.description: 1#include <iostream> 2#include <algorithm> 3#include <cmath> 4#include <string> 5#include <cstring> 6#include <map> 7#include <set> 8#include <queue> 9#include <stack> 10#include <vector> 11#include <cstdint> 12#include <cstdio> 13#include <bitset> 14#include <deque> 15#include <regex> 16#include <list> 17#include <unordered_map> 18#include <unordered_set> 19 20#define debug(a) std::cout<<#a<<"="<<(a)<<"\n" 21#define rep(i,x,y) for(int i=(x);i<=(y);i++) 22#define rrep(i,x,y) for(int i=(x);i>=(y);i--) 23#define mms(x) memset((x), 0, sizeof(x)) 24#define pb push_back 25#define mkp std::make_pair 26#define fi first 27#define se second 28 29using LL = long
